text:
[Verse]
Neon lights they shine so bright
City sleeps but I'm alive
Echoes of the night time sound
Rhythms pulse they drag me down

[Verse 2]
Footsteps echo on the street
Shadows move to their own beat
Heart is racing feel the night
Lost in dreams till morning light

[Chorus]
Midnight city lights aglow
Where time moves so slow
Let the music take control
Feel it deep within your soul

[Verse 3]
Voices whisper in the dark
Every face another spark
In this moment we are free
Dancing till the lights we see

[Chorus]
Midnight city lights aglow
Where time moves so slow
Let the music take control
Feel it deep within your soul

[Bridge]
So we dance beneath the sky
Stars above they shine so high
In the heartbeat of the night
We find our way to the light
title: Midnight City Lights
